previous.title: Determining the Composition of an Object

rowTitles: Your NEO's type and your reasoning
Object on Earth closest to the size of your NEO

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Evaluate your NEO’s economic potential for mining metals. First, consider what class of asteroid you have. Next, think about how hard it would be to travel to this asteroid from Earth. Traveling to an asteroid that is moving at a velocity similar to Earth’s would require less rocket fuel, so an NEO with an orbit similar to Earth's is optimal. Consider an asteroid’s orbital characteristics such as semi-major axis and eccentricity. Explain how you arrived at your answers.

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Compare your NEO to others in your class or workgroup. Which NEO has the most economic potential? Explain.

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Suppose you decide to mine the asteroid. What ethical or political challenges might arise if you decide to claim it as your own?
